projects.title: This Website
projects.description: Personal site I use to show recent projects, interests, hobbies, and provide contact info.

projects.title: City Matcher
projects.description: Android application that matches a users personality & preferences to a big city in the U.S.

projects.title: Messenging App
projects.description: Simple terminal based instant messaging service to practice socket programming. Built on TCP/IP stack

projects.title: Mega Man
projects.description: Replica of the Guts Man level for the original 2D Mega Man. Built with state/behavioral design pattern.

projects.title: Urban Rain
projects.description: Network scanner, helps evaluate a networks topology. Scans include: UDP, TCP, os detection, service detection, & syn flood module
